---
title: "SEGUL Benchmark"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
bench <- readr::read_csv(here("data", "summary_bench_spectre.csv")) |>
  dplyr::mutate_at("cpu_usage", stringr::str_remove_all, "%") |>
  dplyr::mutate_at("cpu_usage", readr::parse_number)

```

```{r}
bench |>
  ggplot(aes(x = execution_time_secs, y = memory_usage, color = Programs)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(x = "Execution time (secs)", y = "Memory usage")
```
```{r}
bench |>
  ggplot(aes(x = execution_time_secs, y = cpu_usage, color = Programs)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(x = "Execution time (secs)", y = "CPU usage")
```
